description:
The under-funded TV station "TV Nanana" works daily to make up for their lack of budget with wisdom, stamina, and teamwork as they battle rival networks. But between the younger audience`s loss of interest in traditional TV, a sharp decrease in ad spending, and a decrease in enthusiasm for their independently produced programming has put the company in its most dire situation ever.
So, in a desperate attempt to secure high ratings--and the network`s survival--the director of the expedition team, Nanaoka, his cameraman, Nanamori, and AD Nanayama decide to secure footage of the legendary cryptid, the kraken. To do so, they will travel to the perilous supernatural sea known as the Banana Triangle! After chartering passage on an illegal squid fishing boat, they head out to sea. But waiting for them in the mysterious waters ahead are vicious sharks, giant whales, and fearsome pirates! Not only that, but after drifting ashore on an isolated island, they encounter an increasingly odd menagerie of characters.
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Life doesn`t seem to get any easier for the TV Nanana expedition crew, as the troubles that affect all of modern TV seem to weigh extra heavily on their tiny company. With a mandate to travel to the distant Banana Triangle in order to capture footage of the legendary Kraken, it`s up to Director Nanaoka, AD Nanayama, and cameraman Nanamori to survive a fierce trip across the ocean in pursuit big ratings!
Source: crunchyroll

The expedition crew takes to the sea in search of the Kraken, but their ship seems a little less than comfortable, and the captain a little more than intoxicated.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Voyage! On the Good Ship Cost Performance
航海! コスパのいい船

REGULAR.description:
Swallowed by a whale, Nanaoka and his team encounter a long-lost TV Nanana director and his staff.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Staying Healthy! With the Unmotivated Adventurers
健康! やる気のない勇者たち

REGULAR.description:
After making peace with being swallowed by a massive aquatic mammal, the expedition crew decide to enjoy the spa facilities found within. But will their bliss last for long?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Slice of Heaven! Blissing Out Inside a Whale
極楽! クジラでととのう

REGULAR.description: The expedition crew have decided to escape the whale that swallowed them. But if they want to keep their general-audiences friendly timeslot, they`re going to need to avoid the... natural... way that objects that are swallowed by animals get expelled!

titles.title: Defend with Your Lives! The Mini Golden Time Slot
死守! ゴールデンのミニ枠

REGULAR.description: While scouring the seas for the legendary Kraken, the TV Nanana boat has run into engine trouble! And to make matters worse, the cell phones that their workplace provided have been replaced with a more analog, and feathery, solution.

The expedition crew are adrift at sea after encountering engine trouble. They pin their hopes for rescue to messenger pigeons, who manage to bring in help... and even more trouble!
Source: crunchyroll

Nanaoka, Nanayama, and Nanamori are now hostages aboard a pirate ship. They`ll be freed as long as the network pays for their ransom, but will the notoriously spendthrift TV station be willing to save the crew`s lives?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Captured! Terror Aboard the Pirate Ship
拿捕! 恐怖の海賊船

REGULAR.description:
The redbeard pirates are waiting to hear back from TV Nanana to see if the expedition crew`s ransom is going to be paid. In the meantime, they`ll focus on their alternative method of making money: trying to hit it big on the video sharing service, 7tube!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 配信! 船上の副業ブーム

REGULAR.description:
Nanana III 10: Time has run out for the expedition crew, as their bosses at TV Nanana have (predictably) opted not to pay their ransom. But, do sharks even eat bananas?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 社長! シビアな金銭交渉

REGULAR.description:
The pirate ship holding the expedition crew captive has been attacked by a giant, tentacled sea creature! Will the staff from TV Nanana finally get footage of the legendary Kraken?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 出現! 狂暴な巨大生物

REGULAR.description:
Shipwrecked on a remote island, Nanaoka and his team search for food and supplies, only to find someone resembling one of their TV rivals...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 茄子! 破天荒ディレクター

REGULAR.description:
Having encountered a group of castaways, the crew from TV Nanana learn about how their network is indirectly responsible for the new group`s survival.
Source: crunchyroll

Still stranded on a remote island, the expedition crew decides to explore their new surroundings.
Source: crunchyroll

The expedition team splits up to search for the Kraken, and Nanamori discovers a strange isolated house with even stranger residents.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 恋愛! 謎のシェアハウス

REGULAR.description:
Just when it seems Nanamori`s encounter with reality TV stardom might help him track down the Kraken, he encounters some unexpected competition.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 到来! 初めてのモテキ

REGULAR.description:
Searching for a legendary creature like the Kraken can be hungry work, and doing it on an isolated island in the middle of nowhere doesn`t leave a lot of options for lunch. Thankfully, the expedition crew may have a new alternative for getting something to eat via delivery.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 注文! 人気の弁当デリバリー

REGULAR.description:
The expedition crew manage to find an octopus-themed pub on the island, which will hopefully provide them with a lead for tracking down the Kraken.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: たこ! 八郎の居酒屋

REGULAR.description:
Enter Master Takohashi, the octopus hunter with amazing dexterity. Could this veteran octopus expert hold the key to locating the Kraken?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 直撃! タコ捕りハンター

REGULAR.description:
It`s a whole new adventure island as Master Takohashi takes the expedition crew on a journey to find the legendary Kraken!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 連射! タコ橋名人の冒険島

REGULAR.description:
The TV Nanana crew has finally discovered the location of the legendary Kraken! But will they be able to lure it out into the open?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sacrifice! The Siren That Tempts the Monster
生贄! 怪物を誘う美女

REGULAR.description:
With Nanayama in the clutches of the Kraken, Nanaoka and Nanamori have a flash of inspiration on how to best capitalize on the situation.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 痛快! クラーケン一家

REGULAR.description:
Just as the Expedition Team is finally about to capture footage of the legendary Kraken, they find themselves at the mercy of an organization looking to protect the likeness rights of cryptids!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Likeness Rights! The Mysterious Giant Organization
権利! 謎の巨大組織

REGULAR.description:
The crew of TV Nanana squares off against the agents of NASLAC, with big ratings on the line!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dokusen! TV Yarou no Hanabi Taikai
Exclusive! The Wacky TV Fireworks Festival
独占! テレビ野郎の花火大会
TV Yarou Nanana: Kaibutsu Kraken o Oe!
Wacky TV Nanana: Hunt the Legendary Kraken!
テレビ野郎 ナナーナ 怪物クラーケンを追え!
Wacky TV Nanana: Chase the Kraken Monster!
